alert.note: Alert for Rockland (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 10:11AM EST until December 20 at 6:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of northeast New Jersey, including the following counties, Bergen and Passaic and southeast New York, including the following county, Rockland. * WHEN...Until 115 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. The Saddle River at Ridgewood is in major flood stage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1010 AM EST, gauge reports indicated heavy rain. Flooding is already occurring in the warned area including the Saddle River at Ridgewood. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Ridgewood, Ramsey, Hawthorne, Fair Lawn, Wyckoff, Glen Rock, Waldwick, Upper Saddle River, Montvale, Midland Park, Allendale, Woodcliff Lake, Ho-Ho-Kus and Saddle River. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
